mapper.select: select * from reboard order by team desc, step asc
mapper.insert: insert into reboard(reboard_idx, title, writer, content, team) values(seq_reboard.nextval, #{title}, #{writer}, #{content}, seq_reboard.nextval)
mapper.update: update reboard set title=#{title}, writer=#{writer}, content=#{content} where reboard_idx=#{reboard_idx}
update reboard set hit=hit+1 where reboard_idx=#{reboard_idx}
